1094285280339783681.text:
It's February 2019 & the crypto markets still feature:

- unregistered securities on unregulated exchanges
- no qualified custodians, no ETFs, plenty of hackers
- ponzi schemes, exit scams, market manipulation . . .

We have a long way to go before crypto is ready for prime time.

1087756888014536704.text:
Globally, a decentralized exchange application may be split into 4 components:

1) Blockchain platform & technical implementation
2) Counterparty discovery mechanism
3) Order matching algorithm
4) Transaction settlement protocol

From @LindsayxLin
 https://buff.ly/2FIH5qF pic.twitter.com/BITEuK7kS8

#G20 #cryptocurrency #regulation takeaway : 
- A draft may consider cryptos as assets rather than currencies
- At this stage, no call for regulation for #crypto
- G20 may think about proposing guidelines on #crypto
- France would like a specific legal status for crypto exchangespic.twitter.com/XRPtWRg5hj
